Allianz Life Insurance Co | Minneapolis, MN | C#, Financial Math/Investments/Hedging | Full Time | ONSITE

Be an investment quant/analyst without selling your soul to Wall Street. Protect insurance policyholder money efficiently instead of sucking as much profit out of the market as possible. Work 40 hour weeks (for real).

We are looking for people with a hybrid software engineer/financial math skill set. Heavy on one or the other is okay but some exposure to both is necessary: we continuously hack on our in-house C# hedging platform, and we don't do it with corporate IT specs and requirements thrown over the wall, so you need to be able to understand how our hedging strategies work.

Apply at https://www.allianz.com/careers/allianzlife using reference code AZL-53324542-2. That job posting focuses on fixed income/strategy experience and requires a master's degree equivalent, but don't be put off: we have other openings. You can also email me at andy.feldman@allianzlife.com or just reply to this comment. I am a manager on the hedging team, not a recruiter.
